// Common Library: Clock Gating cell with synchronizer


module prim_clock_gating_sync (


  input        clk_i,


  input        rst_ni,


  input        test_en_i,


  input        async_en_i,


  output logic en_o,


  output logic clk_o


);






  prim_flop_2sync #(


    .Width(1)


  ) i_sync (


    .clk_i,


    .rst_ni,


    .d(async_en_i),


    .q(en_o)


  );




  prim_clock_gating i_cg (


    .clk_i,


    .en_i(en_o),


    .test_en_i,


    .clk_o


  );






endmodule
